#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <queue>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  int n, a, sz;
  long long x;
  priority_queue<long long> up, down;
  scanf("%d",&n);
  sz = 0;
  while(n--) {
    scanf("%d",&a);
    if(a==1) {
      scanf("%lld",&x);
      if(sz<=3) down.push(x);
      else if(x>=-up.top()) up.push(-x);
      else down.push(x);
      sz++;
      while(up.size() < sz/3) {
	x = down.top();
	down.pop();
	up.push(-x);
      }
      if(up.size() > sz/3) {
	x = -up.top();
	up.pop();
	down.push(x);
      }
    } else {
      if(sz/3 == 0) printf("No reviews yet\n");
      else printf("%lld\n",-up.top());
    }
  }
  return 0;
}
